name: LOUISIANA ENDOWMENT FOR THE HUMANITIES
description: Enriching lives of Louisianans by investing in diverse, statewide public programs
sampleDescriptions: Assist Client on a variety of issues ranging from Head Start and disaster preparedness to literacy and cultural preservation in connection with federal funding opportunities.
